title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform with bowie knife and single shot pistol]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform with bowie knife and single shot pistol] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 7.7 x 6.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-248. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (DLC/PP-2012:127). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army.--Virginia Infantry Regiment, 57th--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Knives--1860-1870. Handguns--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31307 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2681
